plot: All Samuel wanted to do was to save his son's life. Jo's job is to get rid of high priced insurance liabilities like Samuele's son, Max. Revenge turns into Samuel being able to spend just a little more time with Max, or the next best thing.
title: Bitter Shoes
plot_es: All Samuel wanted to do was to save his son's life. Jo's job is to get rid of high priced insurance liabilities like Samuele's son, Max. Revenge turns into Samuel being able to spend just a little more time with Max, or the next best thing.
